item.title: Icon Horse - Dead simple & easy to use favicons for any website
item.description: When building products on the web, mobile or desktop, you often needs favicons (logos of websites). Icon Horse was born from that need ‚Äì one simple URL for any given website you can embed in your app. And if it can't find an icon, it serves a fallback!
item.content:encoded: When building products on the web, mobile or desktop, you often needs favicons (logos of websites). Icon Horse was born from that need ‚Äì one simple URL for any given website you can embed in your app. And if it can't find an icon, it serves a fallback!
